summary: Royal Marines defend Government House from Argentine invaders during the events that triggered the Falklands War.
cast: Ian Richardson|Rosemary Leach|Ian McNeice|James Warrior|Marc Warren|Elizabeth Bradley|Kate Spiro|Holly Barker|Claire Slater|Hugh Ross|Bob Peck|Ian Embleton|Aidan Gillen|Richard Graham|Matthew Ashforde|Richard Long|Garry Cooper|Phil Atkinson|Christopher Northey|Chris Walker|Mike Norman|Christopher Jaffray|Simon Godwin|Jonathan Cohen|Lee Alliston|Alex Norton|Gary Clement|Harry Jones|Trevor Cooper|Morag Siller|Flip Webster|Mike Grady|Tom Hodgkins|Anne Reid|Simon Fisher-Becker|Adam Godley|Janet Robertson|Helen Blades|Antonio Valero|Fulgencio Saturno|Alan Turner|Arturo Venegas|Ricardo Vélez|Vincent S. Boluda|Robert Reina|Juan Martinez|Paul Geoffrey|Stephen Hoye|Stuart Urban
title: Un gesto descortés
